√loc 'see, consider'

[present: locate  ]

perfect: luloce  

[aorist: alulocat  alociṣṭa  lociṣyate  locitā  ]

secondary: intensive: loloc-   -- desiderative: lulociṣa-   -- causative: locayati  locayate etc. E.+  

derivatives: -loca  locaka C.  -locya C.  locana E.+  -locanīya C.  

The same root with the preceding.
